Original Article

Exploring patient and system factors impacting undertriage of injured patients meeting national field triage guideline criteria

Beiriger, Jamison; Puyana, Jacob; Deeb, Andrew-Paul; More

Beiriger, Jamison; Puyana, Jacob; Deeb, Andrew-Paul; Silver, David; Lu, Liling; Boland, Sebastian; Brown, Joshua B. Less

PDF

Permissions

In Brief:

Rural setting, Patient/Family Hospital Choice, and Falls were strong predictors of undertriage among injured patients meeting high-level triage criteria. Triage critieria were recognized in >2/3 of rural patients with under triage happening for other system factors.

SDC

PAP
